com.vector.cfg.util.log

Interface ILoggerMessageFormatter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FormattingService

    @PublishedApi(value=CLASS_DEPENDENCY)
public interface ILoggerMessageFormatter
    ILoggerMessageFormatter provides an interface for an OSGi service, which provides the implementation of the FormattingService, if available, otherwise MessageFormat from java is used.

    ChangePolicy.CLASS_DEPENDENCY: It is class dependency, because the class com.vector.cfg.util.text.format.FormattingService is PublishedApi and implements the interface, so the compiler needs this class. A user must not USE this interface in ANY kind!

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String formatDebug(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Object... arguments)
      Formats the passed message with the passed arguments, like an IMixedText.
      java.lang.String formatEndUser(java.lang.String message, java.lang.Object... arguments)
      Formats the passed message with the passed arguments, like an IMixedText.

    • Method Detail

      • formatDebug

        java.lang.String formatDebug(java.lang.String message,
                             java.lang.Object... arguments)
        Formats the passed message with the passed arguments, like an IMixedText.

        The used context in DEBUG, so the passed arguments are expanded with debug information. You should not display the returned string to an end user. Please use formatEndUser(String, Object...) instead.

        Parameters:
        message - the message
        arguments - the arguments
        Returns:
        the formatted string

      • formatEndUser

        java.lang.String formatEndUser(java.lang.String message,
                               java.lang.Object... arguments)
        Formats the passed message with the passed arguments, like an IMixedText.

        The used context in USER, so the passed arguments are expanded without any debug information. You should display the returned string to an end user, instead of formatDebug(String, Object...).

        Parameters:
        message - the message
        arguments - the arguments
        Returns:
        the formatted string
